Feature: Display Category 3 MAR Status for each of the Radiation Facilities
Description: A capability must be provided to display Category 3 MAR status for each building.

Feature: Display Criticality and Fuel Rod Status for each of the Radiation Facilities
Description: A capability must be provided to display criticality status for each building.

Feature: Create a summary csv file of all sources
Description: A capability must be provided to write summary information about all sources in the database into a formatted file and saved in a user-defined directory, or emailed.
